name: Get A Job, Baby!
description:
This is a brief project made for Ludum Dare 45. I didn't have nearly as much time as I had hoped to work on it, but here it is nonetheless.

I hope you enjoy it and remember to rate it for LD45!

NB! The source code is included, but I had to make a few last minute fixes and it looks quite bad with its current global fix (at least imo).
